name: environMENTAL
description: A deadly virus has hit your town, turning average people into... BUSINESSMEN! As your town's last enironmentalist, it is up to you to stop the evil businessmen from destroying your beautiful natural paradise! The more they build, the less space there is for nature to flourish. There is only one way to stop this virus... DEATH!  Don't let them build up the whole town! Stop them before it's too late!
